attributes.action: Keep Mr Smiths Nightclub in Warrington, Cheshire, Open for the forseeable future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to keep this place open, and control the masses with a strict dress code of:
1. Ben Sherman Shirt
2. School Pants
3. Pod/Kickers Shoes
4. Mish Mash Boxers
On a serious note, keep it open. There is nowhere else to go!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
